name: Divi Noble
movement: 30 ft. walking, 30 ft. burrowing, 30 ft. flying
description: The Divi Noble is a large elemental creature embodying the power of earth, capable of burrowing through stone and earth without a trace.
memorable: Its ability to manipulate the terrain and summon stone walls makes it a strategic enemy in battle.
goals: To dominate the battlefield through physical combat and terrain manipulation.
relations: May serve powerful elemental beings or dwell within mountainous regions.
environment: Typically found in earth or stone-rich environments, such as caves or mountainous areas.
strengths: Exceptional strength and constitution make it a tough opponent in melee combat.
weaknesses: Very low intelligence, wisdom, and charisma, limiting its interaction capabilities.
attacks: Crushing Hand grapples foes, Stone Club delivers powerful bludgeoning damage, and Quake creates difficult terrain.
most_powerful_ability: Earth Glide allows it to maneuver through earth and stone with ease.
senses: The Divi Noble possesses tremorsense and has a passive perception of 16.
skills: Excels in athletics and has notable perception abilities.
additional_information: Can summon an earth elemental once a day.
Innate spellcasting ability with a range of useful spells.
Can create permanent stone walls for strategic advantages.
spellcasting: Innate spellcasting ability for shape manipulation, detection, and terrain control spells.
test_queries: large stone creature that manipulates terrain
powerful elemental that can burrow underground
monster that creates stone walls and causes earthquakes
tough elemental with high hit points and strength
